<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:e1607aa52fa70d5048dca1fef699b6b6</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>recipes_oc_cs</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading) {
    	var tableSysID = "fbefa2a52fa70d5048dca1fef699b689";
        // Hide the result var element
        var ctl = null;
        var anchorElement = null;
        if (catIsDoctype()) {
            ctl = jQuery(control).parent().closest("div");
            if (ctl.length > 0) {
                ctl.hide();
                var ctl2 = ctl.prevAll("div");
                if (ctl2.length > 0) {
                    ctl2.hide();
                }
                anchorElement = ctl.parent().closest("div");
            }
        } else {
            ctl = jQuery(control);
            ctl.parent().closest("tr").hide();
            anchorElement = ctl.parent().closest("td");
        }
        if (!anchorElement || anchorElement.length == 0) {
            alert("Anchor Element not found");
            return;
        }

        var isCatItem = g_form.getTableName() != "sc_req_item" && g_form.getTableName() != "sc_task" ? "true" : "false";

        var ga = new GlideAjax("SCTblVarAjax");
        ga.addParam("sysparm_name", "getTableProperties");
        ga.addParam("sysparm_table_sys_id", tableSysID);
        ga.addParam("sysparm_is_cat_item", isCatItem);
        ga.getXMLAnswer(processAjaxResponse, null, anchorElement);
    }

    function processAjaxResponse(answer, anchorElement) {
        var scripts = ["x_58056_cat_tbl_var.moment.jsdbx", "x_58056_cat_tbl_var.bootstrap-datetimepic.jsdbx", "x_58056_cat_tbl_var.SCTblVar_DateTime.jsdbx", "x_58056_cat_tbl_var.SCTblVar.jsdbx"];
        var tableData = JSON.parse(answer);

        var table = g_form.getTableName();
        tableData.isCatalogForm = table != "sc_req_item" && table != "sc_task";

        if (tableData.status != "error") {
            if (typeof acn_sc_table_variable == "undefined") {
                ScriptLoader.getScripts(scripts, function() {
                            renderTable(tableData, anchorElement);
                        });
            } else {
                renderTable(tableData, anchorElement);
            }
        } else {
            alert(tableData.message);
        }
    }

    function renderTable(tableData, anchorElement) {
        jQuery("head").append("<style>" + tableData.loadCSS + "</style>");
        var instance = acn_sc_table_variable.buildTable(tableData, anchorElement);
        instance.initialize(newValue);
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-19 00:04:25</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>69607aa52fa70d5048dca1fef699b6db</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>recipes_oc_cs</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Markdown Documents" source="x_58056_md_docs">7ac0b5344f212300ecf18c318110c745</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Markdown Documents">7ac0b5344f212300ecf18c318110c745</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_69607aa52fa70d5048dca1fef699b6db</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-19 00:04:25</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
